title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8201.4 - Fiscal officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8201.4 - Fiscal officer

State Regulations
(a) The
fiscal officer shall certify the payroll and respond to request for an itemized
record setting forth the name, address, title and salary of every officer or
employee of the agency. (b) The
fiscal officer shall make the payroll items listed above available to any
person including bona fide members of the news media as required under section
88(1)(g)(1),(i), and (10) of the Freedom of Information Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8201.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
